data.title: IBM SevOne Network Performance Management
data.meta_description: Credly is a global Open Badge platform that closes the gap between skills and opportunities. We work with academic institutions, corporations, and professional associations to translate learning outcomes into digital credentials that are immediately validated, managed, and shared.
data.text:
This credential earner has demonstrated proficiency in implementing and configuring IBM SevOne Network Performance Management (NPM). This training includes introducing the platform, NetFlow, LiveMaps, capacity planning, custom SNMP polling, hardware health, data insights, and reporting to optimize management and workflows. Earning this badge ensures the technical foundation to use SevOne NPM effectively and a high level of commitment to using the IBM suite to manage enterprise networks.

Type Validation

Level Intermediate

Time Days

Cost Paid

Additional Details
